name: Arr Matey / random.json
description: Pirate-speak translations for random image commands.
author: ScarlxtPink

data.random.error.fetch_error: Arr! Couldn' fetch th' image, matey (code: {code})
data.random.error.generic_error: Blimey! Can't fetch th' image right now. Try again later, ye scallywag.
